S.FORM: == Men-ten 緬甸 == Liksi 歷史 hakiya mibatad tu aydaay nu pitu a lasubu idaw ku lima a wang nu mihcaan idaw ku mutidengay nu ungayen maudip, Men-ten idaw ku nikaadihan tu malumanay a ba'tuan nu mautangay a tuudan, nu baluhay a ba'tuan nu zitayan a liwan nu namaka babalakiay hinaadih kita, pasu aydaay a Yi-luo-wa-ti sa'wac a niyadu'an makaadih kita tu lima a malebu nu mihcaan a lalangwan nu liwan namaka babalakiay. . pelean ku Men-tan " pabaway a Men-tan" atu " sasaay a Men-tan" u Ing-kuo nu taydaay mikuwan a nikapapelaan . saan tu siyen nu ayawan tu tusa a lasubu mihcaan, u matinengay a madubaay nu tademaw micumud i Yi-luo-wa-ti sa'wac nu pabawan, mikuwan tu Cung-kuo atu In-tu nu sasiwbayan nu dadanan. nikudan nu tusaay a seci mung-cu tayni i Si-tan sa'wac, itida i walsipsiw mihcaan Men-ten a tademaw mikuwan tu Peaw sa'wac patideng tu Pu-kan-cen. itida i waltulimmihcaan -caypiclimpic mihcaan, Mung-cu kuo-wav mikuwan tu Nan-men-ten. caysepsipsip mihcaan –caytuwalpic mihcaan, Men-cu kuo-wan u Pu-kan-cen malingatu mikuwan. caytupicwal mihcaan, yen-caw sihu mipatideng tu Men-cung-sin-sen, mikuwan tu wali amis niyadu'an. nikudan miliyas, mipulung tu Yuen-na sen-cun-su-sin. caytuwalpic mihcaan -caylimlucay mihcaan, San-cu kuo-wan ci A-wa u Men-ten teban nu niyadu' malingatu mikuwan. caylimlucay mihcaan—caypiclimtu mihcaan, Tun-yi wan-caw mikuwan tu Men-ten. caypiclimtu mihcaan –caywalwallim mihcaan, Kun-pan wan-caw mikuwan tu Men-ten. . caywaltusip mihcaan -caywaltunem mihcaan, sayaway malepacaw ku Ing-kuo Men-ten, Ing-kuo ku sibalucuay a makata. caywallimtu mihcaan, sakakina tusa a nikalepacawan nu Ing-kuo Men-ten, Ing-kuo a hitay maala nuheni ku Men-ten nu duma a kakaitidaan. cawwalwallim mihcaan sakatulu a malepacaw ku Ing-kuo Men-ten, mamin debungan nu Ing-kuo ku Men-ten, pacumud han i Ta-ing-ti-kuo sasay nu In-tu a lalaan, malaIn-kuo a In-tu nu niyaduan. Yun-kuy sakakaay ci Cen-yi-ing matineng tina kawawan pacudad, sakamusa ku cin-cen hu tu itidaay a Ing-kuo ci cen-ci-yi pasayda i Ign-kuo sihu mipaculi miwawies nai' ku puc. caywalwalnem mihcaan, Cung-kuo atu Ing-kuo itida i Pea-cin masasulit tu kiyaku " Cung-Ing-Men cudadan", patucek tu Cung-kuo palutatengan ku Ing-kuo tu Men-ten idaw ku nipapikuwanan tu nikakenihan, nika hidan tu nu Men-ten ku Cung-kuo, tu maycacay a bataan patungus. saan tu Cung-men lilis nai' ku watan tu nikakenisan, awnutusaay a kanatal ku masasudangay. 1824年－1826年, ." caywalsiwsep mihcaan –caysiwsippic mihcaan, Cen-pan, Wa-pan mala Ta-ing-ti-kuo a diputan nu kanatal. Ke'-cin-pan, Cin-pan u kakenisan a sincen kitidaan. caywalsiwsip mihcaan, ci Sye-hu-cen itida i Lun-tun atu Ing-kuo masasulit tu " Cung-Ing-Ten-Men sasiwbayan a cudadan". caywalsiwpic mihcaan,misumad tu nikiyakuan tu nikakenisan tu lala' atu sasiwbayan milidasu a cudadan. Men-tan mihedek tu Ing-kuo kabulaway a lala' u Ing-ku nu In-tu a niyadu'an, u In-tu tapang ku pataydaay tu tademaw mikuwan tu Men-tan. caysiwlupic mihcaan sepat a bulad cacay a demiad, " In-tu sihu cuda" micuduh, Men-ten miliyas tu Ing-kuo u In-tu, mala Ta-ing-ti-kuo Men-ten niyadu'an. tuseptucay tusa a bulad cacay a demiad, Men-ten hitay patahekal tu sakay lawlaw nu hitay, ci Wun-san-su-ci dakepen nu Men-ten a hitay, maputun namin ku sakatahekal a telayan. sakamusa ku kanatal a patilibiay nu Men-ten saan caay ka kapah ku gigicu sisa caay patehekali, nikuda kapahtu saan Men-ten hitay mihapu tu kanatal tu sakabalihenawan tu cacay nu mihcaan a singbung. Men-ten hitay, sakamusa midakep ci Wun-san-su-ci a tademawan u wayway ,mamipatubeli i tuseptusep mihcaan nu Men-ten yi-huy pisingkiwan miawban tu nipisingkiw a nipatuduan. sabaw tusa a bulad enem a demiad, hiyan ni Nay-pi-duo-ce-pu-de-zuy huing saan " palawlaway ku cumi" atu " mibelihay tu sakay libung a puce" nu mapalekan ku cumi. sepat a mihcaan mapulul, u Kuo-cya-kun-li-wi-yen- hue sakakaay ci Men-an miwada tu tusa a mihcaan. 2021年2月1日, 2年. cen-ce atu hitay a kawaw 政治與軍事 Men-ten ayda u hitay ku mikuwanay a kanatal, satalakaway nu mililiday a cikuo u " Men-ten kanatal mikuwana". ngangan han u kanatal a tapang atu sihu nu tapan ku Men-ten cung-tun, lima a mihcaan mikuwan, u Men-tan nu tusaay a yi-huy ku misingkiway. tatengaay u tapang nu sihu ku Men-tan cung-li, tuseptucay mihcaan taluma'ac, mitusa tu kawaw u Men-ten hitay sakakaay atu kuo-cya-kun-li-wi-yen-huy sakakaay ci Men-an ku sikawaway. . sakaudip 經濟 u liwmah ku kawaw nu Men-ten a kanatal, sakaudip nu heni tu mihmihcaan caycaywalsep menyen, mikawaway tu laliwmahan a tademaw makaala tu nemsep %, idaw ku tipus, mugi, tebus. Kilakilangan makaala tu limsep %, kilang u atekakay a kilangan atu sakaetiman a yiw-mu a kilangan. kitidaan nu Men-ten-len-pan-kun-he-kuo itida i wali timul a tipan amisan, wali atu Cung-kuo, Lew-kuo atu Tay-kuo mababiyaw, nupan a In-tu atu Mun-cya-la kanatal matatulin. nutipan timulan micapi tu Mun-cya-la sa'wac, timul sibiyaw tu An-ta-man bayu. ahebal makaala tu 676,578 pinhun-kunli, u wali timul i enalan u satabakiay a kanatalan. Men-ten liwliw u buyu' naming, nutipan idaw ku buyubuyu'an, amis idaw ku Si-ma-la-ya buyu', Hen-tun buyubuyu'an, wali atu walitimul u Cen-pan buyu' atu Dan-na-sa-lin buyubuyu'an. teban u enal. itida i amis Si-ma-la-ya buyu' teban a Kay-cya-puo-hu talakaw 5881 mi, u Men-ten u satalakaway nu wali timulan. . lalangaw Yeng-kun-ta-cin-se 文化 仰光大金寺 bungsang itida i Men-ten u sakasikadan, pabaway a fuocyaw itida i siyen nuayawan tu san se-ci idaw t uku pacuday i Men-ten, itida i sabaw tu cacay a seci mala hucunu binacadan a palutatengaan, katukuh ayda. . lalangaw nu Men-ten 緬甸文化 kamu nu Men-ten u Han-cen a Cen-men-yi-cu-men-yi akamuan, u liwmah ku kawaw nu binacada, i sumamaday a lalanawan nu sasinzaan, wen-sya atu cen-ce, malalid nu In-tu lalangawan. u Pu-kan wancaw ku dayhiw, patideng i sabaw cacay a lingatu nu secian, u Pu-kan ku suo-tu. patideng tu sin-cen, idaw ku hulic, nituktukan a kilang atu nalimaan a nipikulit, nisulitan a Me-ten cudad maala ku Pa-li-wen atu Fan-wen, malabangcalay nu palutatengaan a sulit nu cudad. patidengan tu biyu a luma' " ciw-su-ci-kan-fuo-ta" ku dayhiw. . kakanen 飲食 Mohinga 魚湯米粉 Men-ten a tada lami' 緬甸的國菜 tipus ku kasiidaan nu heni, u hemay ku kanen. sakalanam nuheni hina kan tu kabiay nu buting, sanasay a tuwmi, aam nu sanasay, samanta' han ku tuwami, samata' tu mihun atu panay, sanasay, waneng cancanan nu dankawan. mananam mukan tu uciya ku Men-tan a tademaw. tayda i uciyaan minanum tu sibulingay a uciyaan, mukan tu mantu, yuciyakuy atu yupin, manamuh minip tu kabi nu buting, aam nu taduk. . mikizay ku Men-ten a tademaw tu kan. u butin kabus a nimelecan masatawyuay, daydam, salamien ku wadayan, cileminay a papah ku sasahemayan. masinanut ku Men-ten a tademaw tu simal, aledahay, bangsisay, mantaay, cileminay, aheciday. nisalami'an han u nisatinpula, ididan, ciyan, pacikah han nanay ku tapang. ni satenpulaan atu ni ididan kapah singaan, samanta' hananay caay paakutien, mikapah tu udip. u sa'wac ku yadah tu bayu ku Men-ten, yadah ku buting udang, hina ala. yadah ku nisabutingan atu ulangan nu nisangaan a tuudan nu Men-ten,manamuh pacikah tu tebu' malacileminay a tebuan ku Men-ten, atu duma nu lami'an, sipalamel i basi, asu' ku azi. .

== Men-ten 緬甸 == Liksi 歷史 hakiya mibatad to aydaay no pito a lasobo idaw ko lima a wang no mihcaan idaw ko motidengay no ongayen maodip, Men-ten idaw ko nikaadihan to malomanay a ba'toan no maotangay a toodan, no balohay a ba'toan no zitayan a liwan no namaka babalakiay hinaadih kita, paso aydaay a Yi-loo-wa-ti sa'wac a niyado'an makaadih kita to lima a malebo no mihcaan a lalangwan no liwan namaka babalakiay. . pelean ko Men-tan " pabaway a Men-tan" ato " sasaay a Men-tan" o Ing-koo no taydaay mikowan a nikapapelaan . saan to siyen no ayawan to tosa a lasobo mihcaan, o matinengay a madobaay no tademaw micomod i Yi-loo-wa-ti sa'wac no pabawan, mikowan to Cong-koo ato In-to no sasiwbayan no dadanan. nikodan no tosaay a seci mong-co tayni i Si-tan sa'wac, itida i walsipsiw mihcaan Men-ten a tademaw mikowan to Peaw sa'wac patideng to Po-kan-cen. itida i waltolimmihcaan -caypiclimpic mihcaan, Mong-co koo-wav mikowan to Nan-men-ten. caysepsipsip mihcaan –caytowalpic mihcaan, Men-co koo-wan o Po-kan-cen malingato mikowan. caytopicwal mihcaan, yen-caw siho mipatideng to Men-cong-sin-sen, mikowan to wali amis niyado'an. nikodan miliyas, mipolong to Yoen-na sen-con-so-sin. caytowalpic mihcaan -caylimlocay mihcaan, San-co koo-wan ci A-wa o Men-ten teban no niyado' malingato mikowan. caylimlocay mihcaan—caypiclimto mihcaan, Ton-yi wan-caw mikowan to Men-ten. caypiclimto mihcaan –caywalwallim mihcaan, Kon-pan wan-caw mikowan to Men-ten. . caywaltosip mihcaan -caywaltonem mihcaan, sayaway malepacaw ko Ing-koo Men-ten, Ing-koo ko sibalocoay a makata. caywallimto mihcaan, sakakina tosa a nikalepacawan no Ing-koo Men-ten, Ing-koo a hitay maala noheni ko Men-ten no doma a kakaitidaan. cawwalwallim mihcaan sakatolo a malepacaw ko Ing-koo Men-ten, mamin debongan no Ing-koo ko Men-ten, pacomod han i Ta-ing-ti-koo sasay no In-to a lalaan, malaIn-koo a In-to no niyadoan. Yon-koy sakakaay ci Cen-yi-ing matineng tina kawawan pacodad, sakamosa ko cin-cen ho to itidaay a Ing-koo ci cen-ci-yi pasayda i Ign-koo siho mipacoli miwawies nai' ko poc. caywalwalnem mihcaan, Cong-koo ato Ing-koo itida i Pea-cin masasolit to kiyako " Cong-Ing-Men codadan", patocek to Cong-koo palotatengan ko Ing-koo to Men-ten idaw ko nipapikowanan to nikakenihan, nika hidan to no Men-ten ko Cong-koo, to maycacay a bataan patongos. saan to Cong-men lilis nai' ko watan to nikakenisan, awnotosaay a kanatal ko masasodangay. 1824年－1826年, ." caywalsiwsep mihcaan –caysiwsippic mihcaan, Cen-pan, Wa-pan mala Ta-ing-ti-koo a dipotan no kanatal. Ke'-cin-pan, Cin-pan o kakenisan a sincen kitidaan. caywalsiwsip mihcaan, ci Sye-ho-cen itida i Lon-ton ato Ing-koo masasolit to " Cong-Ing-Ten-Men sasiwbayan a codadan". caywalsiwpic mihcaan,misomad to nikiyakoan to nikakenisan to lala' ato sasiwbayan milidaso a codadan. Men-tan mihedek to Ing-koo kabolaway a lala' o Ing-ko no In-to a niyado'an, o In-to tapang ko pataydaay to tademaw mikowan to Men-tan. caysiwlopic mihcaan sepat a bolad cacay a demiad, " In-to siho coda" micodoh, Men-ten miliyas to Ing-koo o In-to, mala Ta-ing-ti-koo Men-ten niyado'an. toseptocay tosa a bolad cacay a demiad, Men-ten hitay patahekal to sakay lawlaw no hitay, ci Won-san-so-ci dakepen no Men-ten a hitay, mapoton namin ko sakatahekal a telayan. sakamosa ko kanatal a patilibiay no Men-ten saan caay ka kapah ko gigico sisa caay patehekali, nikoda kapahto saan Men-ten hitay mihapo to kanatal to sakabalihenawan to cacay no mihcaan a singbong. Men-ten hitay, sakamosa midakep ci Won-san-so-ci a tademawan o wayway ,mamipatobeli i toseptosep mihcaan no Men-ten yi-hoy pisingkiwan miawban to nipisingkiw a nipatodoan. sabaw tosa a bolad enem a demiad, hiyan ni Nay-pi-doo-ce-po-de-zoy hoing saan " palawlaway ko comi" ato " mibelihay to sakay libong a poce" no mapalekan ko comi. sepat a mihcaan mapolol, o Koo-cya-kon-li-wi-yen- hoe sakakaay ci Men-an miwada to tosa a mihcaan. 2021年2月1日, 2年. cen-ce ato hitay a kawaw 政治與軍事 Men-ten ayda o hitay ko mikowanay a kanatal, satalakaway no mililiday a cikoo o " Men-ten kanatal mikowana". ngangan han o kanatal a tapang ato siho no tapan ko Men-ten cong-ton, lima a mihcaan mikowan, o Men-tan no tosaay a yi-hoy ko misingkiway. tatengaay o tapang no siho ko Men-tan cong-li, toseptocay mihcaan taloma'ac, mitosa to kawaw o Men-ten hitay sakakaay ato koo-cya-kon-li-wi-yen-hoy sakakaay ci Men-an ko sikawaway. . sakaodip 經濟 o liwmah ko kawaw no Men-ten a kanatal, sakaodip no heni to mihmihcaan caycaywalsep menyen, mikawaway to laliwmahan a tademaw makaala to nemsep %, idaw ko tipos, mogi, tebos. Kilakilangan makaala to limsep %, kilang o atekakay a kilangan ato sakaetiman a yiw-mo a kilangan. kitidaan no Men-ten-len-pan-kon-he-koo itida i wali timol a tipan amisan, wali ato Cong-koo, Lew-koo ato Tay-koo mababiyaw, nopan a In-to ato Mon-cya-la kanatal matatolin. notipan timolan micapi to Mon-cya-la sa'wac, timol sibiyaw to An-ta-man bayo. ahebal makaala to 676,578 pinhon-konli, o wali timol i enalan o satabakiay a kanatalan. Men-ten liwliw o boyo' naming, notipan idaw ko boyoboyo'an, amis idaw ko Si-ma-la-ya boyo', Hen-ton boyoboyo'an, wali ato walitimol o Cen-pan boyo' ato Dan-na-sa-lin boyoboyo'an. teban o enal. itida i amis Si-ma-la-ya boyo' teban a Kay-cya-poo-ho talakaw 5881 mi, o Men-ten o satalakaway no wali timolan. . lalangaw Yeng-kon-ta-cin-se 文化 仰光大金寺 bongsang itida i Men-ten o sakasikadan, pabaway a foocyaw itida i siyen noayawan to san se-ci idaw t oko pacoday i Men-ten, itida i sabaw to cacay a seci mala hocono binacadan a palotatengaan, katokoh ayda. . lalangaw no Men-ten 緬甸文化 kamo no Men-ten o Han-cen a Cen-men-yi-co-men-yi akamoan, o liwmah ko kawaw no binacada, i somamaday a lalanawan no sasinzaan, wen-sya ato cen-ce, malalid no In-to lalangawan. o Po-kan wancaw ko dayhiw, patideng i sabaw cacay a lingato no secian, o Po-kan ko soo-to. patideng to sin-cen, idaw ko holic, nitoktokan a kilang ato nalimaan a nipikolit, nisolitan a Me-ten codad maala ko Pa-li-wen ato Fan-wen, malabangcalay no palotatengaan a solit no codad. patidengan to biyo a loma' " ciw-so-ci-kan-foo-ta" ko dayhiw. . kakanen 飲食 Mohinga 魚湯米粉 Men-ten a tada lami' 緬甸的國菜 tipos ko kasiidaan no heni, o hemay ko kanen. sakalanam noheni hina kan to kabiay no boting, sanasay a towmi, aam no sanasay, samanta' han ko towami, samata' to mihon ato panay, sanasay, waneng cancanan no dankawan. mananam mokan to ociya ko Men-tan a tademaw. tayda i ociyaan minanom to sibolingay a ociyaan, mokan to manto, yociyakoy ato yopin, manamoh minip to kabi no boting, aam no tadok. . mikizay ko Men-ten a tademaw to kan. o botin kabos a nimelecan masatawyoay, daydam, salamien ko wadayan, cileminay a papah ko sasahemayan. masinanot ko Men-ten a tademaw to simal, aledahay, bangsisay, mantaay, cileminay, aheciday. nisalami'an han o nisatinpola, ididan, ciyan, pacikah han nanay ko tapang. ni satenpolaan ato ni ididan kapah singaan, samanta' hananay caay paakotien, mikapah to odip. o sa'wac ko yadah to bayo ko Men-ten, yadah ko boting odang, hina ala. yadah ko nisabotingan ato olangan no nisangaan a toodan no Men-ten,manamoh pacikah to tebo' malacileminay a teboan ko Men-ten, ato doma no lami'an, sipalamel i basi, aso' ko azi. .
